item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the RH side and LH side.
The procedures listed below are for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT CABLE FROM NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

atten2.ptxt: Wait at least 90 seconds after disconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal to prevent airbag.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the rear No. 2 seat assembly LH (See page ).
Detach the 6 clips and 4 claws and remove the back door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Put protective tape around the rear door scuff plate.
Using a moulding remover, detach the 3 clips and 7 claws and remove the rear door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the rear door opening trim weatherstrip.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both quarter trim hooks.

s2.ptxt: Remove the screw and quarter trim hook.

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and disconnect the seat belt's floor anchor.

s-1.ptxt: DISCONNECT REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Disconnect the seat belt's floor anchor.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE QUARTER INSIDE TRIM BOARD LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and disconnect the rear No. 1 seat outer belt floor anchor.
Remove the bolt and disconnect the rear No. 2 seat outer belt floor anchor.
Using a clip remover, remove the clip.
Detach the 4 claws, 8 clips and 2 guides and remove the quarter inside trim board.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 claws and open the seat belt anchor cover as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and disconnect the seat belt's shoulder anchor.
Remove the bolt and seat belt.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the 2 claws and open the seat belt anchor cover as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the bolt and disconnect the seat belt's shoulder anchor.
Remove the bolt and seat belt.
